text: Saulius Šarkauskas (born 25 April 1970) is a Lithuanian former cyclist. He competed at the 1992 Summer Olympics and the 2000 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Lithuanian male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Lithuania Category:Cyclists at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Cyclists at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Klaipėda
title: Saulius Šarkauskas
